name: NVSDatabase
description: The "NVSDatabase" library is a C++ library that provides an interface for working with the ESP-IDF's Non-volatile Storage (NVS) API. NVS is used for storing configuration data and other non-volatile information on ESP32 and ESP8266 microcontrollers.
keywords: NVS Database, ESP32 Storage, ESP8266 NVS, Non-volatile Storage, NVS API, Key-Value Storage, ESP-IDF NVS, NVS Library, ronny, antoon, MetaHouse
